forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. North wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the skies are adorned with a gentle swirl of clouds that speak of the quiet night passing. The air holds a brisk chill, hinting at the cool embrace of early morning—a cozy blanket for those who wander the city at this hour. Visibility is moderate, with the peaks of the Golden Gate Bridge lightly veiled, suggesting a delicate dance of fog lingering just off the coast. This morning, the northern winds whisper softly, carrying promises of a day that warms gradually, transitioning from a low of fifty degrees to a high near seventy-one by midday.

Today, the sun will emerge amid patches of brilliant blue, a canvas brightening with each hour. The expected afternoon temperatures will cool slightly, settling into a comfortable sixty-six, perfect for an afternoon stroll along the waterfront. The mild breeze beckons one to don layers—perhaps a classic denim jacket over a soft sweater, coupled with comfortable shoes for meandering through the vibrant streets. As the sunlight bathes the city, it's an ideal time for a visit to your favorite local café, savoring the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee while watching the day unfold. Or perhaps a walk in the nearby parks, where you can soak in the playful ambiance of people enjoying the gentle warmth, reminding us that every day is an invitation to embrace the beauty surrounding us.
